dict.string:
Switches between multiple index values and remembers its current index. This is useful for tabs or other cases where you need to adjust a state based on multiple inputs.
Origami http://origami.facebook.com/
Use of this patch is subject to the license found at http://origami.facebook.com/license/

Created by: Austin Bales
The index of the last input that changed to true.
